citation.article-title: Fermentation of glutamate and other compounds by Acidaminobacter hydrogenoformans gen. nov. sp. nov., an obligate anaerobe isolated from black mud. Studies with pure cultures and mixed cultures with sulfate-reducing and methanogenic bacteria.

p.s: Acidaminobacter (A.cid.a.mi.no.ba'c.ter. M.L.n. acidum acid; adj. amino amino; M.L.n. bacter the masc. equivalent of Gr. neut. n. bacterium a staff or rod; M.L. masc. n. Acidaminobacter the amino acid rod)
Rod-shaped Gram-negative bacteria with pointed ends.
Lactate, succinate, butyrate and ethanol not formed.
Growth on many substrates stimulated by or dependent on the presence of hydrogen-utilizing bacteria.
